participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and friendly, enjoys a simple life in the country.
participant_1.background: i drive a big truck and live in country. i've a pet cow. i only listen to country music. i work my parents farms.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Curious and a bit anxious, loves animals but has a fear of creepy crawlies.
participant_2.background: my father drove a car for nascar. i am terrified of scorpions. i've a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey.
